shortdesc.i: Sets the user's display picture from a URI. A dialog appears and allows the user to accept or cancel the change. Note that the display picture cannot exceed 32KB.

section.p: The URI must be fully qualified. Non-local URIs must be whitelisted in the application's configuration file. Examples:

ul.li: Locally from within the widget package (e.g. "local:///smiley.jpg")
From the filesystem of a BB10 device (e.g. "file:///accounts/1000/shared/photos/smiley.jpg")

dd.p: Invoked when the request to change the display picture is shown to the user.
True if the image was found
Invoked when there was an error setting the picture.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

    // Set the user's display picture
    blackberry.bbm.platform.self.setDisplayPicture("local:///smiley.jpg", function (success) {
        alert("Image found");
    }), function (error) {
        alert(error);
    });

</script>
